sources.title: Cuore (1973) Domenico Santoro, Renato Cestiè, Duilio Cruciani | Full Movie with Subtitles
sources.description:
Four stories with four boys with similar characters. Tales of courage, morality, spirit of sacrifice, love of people. 

Director: Romano Scavolini
Writers: Edmondo De Amicis (novel), Romano Scavolini
Stars: Domenico Santoro, Renato Cestiè, Duilio Cruciani

00:00:00 Full length movie
00:02:41 Part 1
00:24:01 Part 2
00:46:27 Part 3
00:55:39 Part 4

metadata.Plot: Four stories with four boys with similar characters, hard to find in real life, courage, spirit of sacrifice, love of people, morality of angels. All four young actors are convincing. The fourth episode, the one with the boy who takes care of his father who is very ill in the hospital, is also the best. Chris Avram, without speaking much, is very good in double role, the real father and the man who the boy thought that was his father.
metadata.Actors: Domenico Santoro, Renato Cestiè, Duilio Cruciani
